typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CityID as string,
		CityName as string,
		ProvinceID as string,
		Population as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Cities
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		CityID as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Addresses
source(output(
		ProvinceID as string,
		ProvinceCode as string,
		ProvinceName as string,
		CountryID as string,
		Population as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Provinces
Addresses, Cities lookup(Addresses@CityID == Cities@CityID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> AddressesCities
AddressesCities derive(match = isMatch()) ~> CheckMatch
DerivedColumn1, ProvincesF lookup(DerivedColumn1@ProvinceID == ProvincesF@ProvinceID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupProvinces
LookupProvinces derive(matchToProvince = isMatch(),
		inserteddate = currentDate()) ~> CheckMatch02
Select2 split(matchToProvince,
	disjoint: false) ~> IsMatch02@(IsMatch, NotMatch)
Select3 derive(ProvinceID = toInteger(ProvinceID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Provinces derive(ProvinceID = toInteger(ProvinceID)) ~> ProvincesF
CheckMatch02 select(mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		ACityID = CityID_Address,
		PostalCode,
		CityName,
		Population = Provinces@Population,
		match,
		ProvinceCode,
		ProvinceName,
		CountryID,
		Population = Provinces@Population,
		matchToProvince,
		inserteddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
CheckMatch select(mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		CityID_Address = Addresses@CityID,
		PostalCode,
		ModifiedDate = Addresses@ModifiedDate,
		CityID_City = Cities@CityID,
		CityName,
		ProvinceID,
		Population,
		ModifiedDate = Cities@ModifiedDate,
		match
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
IsMatch02@NotMatch sink(input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		ACityID as integer,
		PostalCode as string,
		CityName as string,
		ProvinceCode as string,
		ProvinceName as string,
		CountryID as integer,
		Population as long,
		InsertedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		ACityID,
		PostalCode,
		CityName,
		ProvinceCode,
		ProvinceName,
		CountryID,
		Population,
		InsertedDate = inserteddate
	)) ~> sink2
IsMatch02@IsMatch sink(input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		ACityID as integer,
		PostalCode as string,
		CityName as string,
		ProvinceCode as string,
		ProvinceName as string,
		CountryID as integer,
		Population as long,
		InsertedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		ACityID,
		PostalCode,
		CityName,
		ProvinceCode,
		ProvinceName,
		CountryID,
		Population,
		InsertedDate = inserteddate
	)) ~> sink3
Select3 sink(input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		ACityID as integer,
		PostalCode as string,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		ProvinceID as string,
		Population as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		ACityID = CityID_Address,
		PostalCode,
		CityName,
		ProvinceID,
		Population
	)) ~> sink4
